25 #include <cassert>
26 #include <limits>
27 #include <cmath>
28 
29 #include "binary_stream.hpp"
30 
37 template<>
38 bitpit::IBinaryStream& operator>>(bitpit::IBinaryStream &stream, std::string &value)
39 {
40  int size = 0;
41  stream.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&size), sizeof(size));
42 
43  if (size > 0) {
44  std::vector<char> buffer(size);
45  stream.read(buffer.data(), size);
46  value.assign(buffer.data(), size);
47  }
48 
49  return stream;
50 }
51 
58 template<>
59 bitpit::OBinaryStream& operator<<(bitpit::OBinaryStream &stream, const std::string &value)
60 {
61  int size = value.size();
62  stream.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&size), sizeof(size));
63 
64  if (size > 0) {
65  stream.write(value.c_str(), size);
66  }
67 
68  return stream;
69 }

85 BinaryStream::BinaryStream()
86  : m_size(0), m_pos(0), m_chunkSize(1)
87 {
88 }

98  : m_pos(0)
99 {
100  setSize(size);

112 BinaryStream::BinaryStream(const char *buffer, std::size_t capacity)
113 {
114  open(buffer, capacity);
115 }

125 BinaryStream::BinaryStream(const std::vector<char> &buffer)
126 {
127  open(buffer.data(), buffer.size());
128 }

137 void BinaryStream::open(const char *buffer, std::size_t size)
138 {
139  open(size);
140 
141  m_buffer.assign(buffer, buffer + size);
142 }
143 
149 void BinaryStream::open(std::size_t size)
150 {
151  m_pos = 0;
152 
153  setSize(size);
154 }
155 
161 std::streampos BinaryStream::tellg() const
162 {
163  return m_pos;
164 }
165 
172 bool BinaryStream::seekg(std::size_t pos)
173 {
174  if (pos >= getSize()) {
175  return false;
176  }
177 
178  m_pos = pos;
179 
180  return true;
181 }
182 
188 char * BinaryStream::data()
189 {
190  return m_buffer.data();
191 }
192 
198 const char * BinaryStream::data() const
199 {
200  return m_buffer.data();
201 }
202 
208 bool BinaryStream::eof() const
209 {
210  return (m_pos >= getSize());
211 }
212 
220 bool BinaryStream::seekg(std::streamoff offset, std::ios_base::seekdir way)
221 {
222  if ((way == std::ios_base::beg) && (offset < (long) getSize())) {
223  m_pos = offset;
224  } else if ((way == std::ios_base::cur) && (m_pos + offset < getSize())) {
225  m_pos += offset;
226  } else if ((way == std::ios_base::end) && ((long) getSize() - offset >= 0)) {
227  m_pos = getSize() - offset;
228  } else {
229  return false;
230  }
231 
232  return true;
233 }
234 
240 std::size_t BinaryStream::getSize() const
241 {
242  return m_size;
243 }
244 
250 void BinaryStream::setSize(std::size_t size)
251 {
252  setCapacity(size);
253 
254  m_size = size;
255 }
256 
269 void BinaryStream::setCapacity(std::size_t capacity)
270 {
271  m_chunkSize = 1;
272  std::size_t nChunks = capacity;
273  while (nChunks > (std::size_t) std::numeric_limits<int>::max()) {
274  m_chunkSize = 2 * m_chunkSize;
275  nChunks = (1 + ((capacity - 1) / m_chunkSize));
276  }
277 
278  m_buffer.resize(nChunks * m_chunkSize);
279 }
280 
291 int BinaryStream::getChunkSize()
292 {
293  return m_chunkSize;
294 }
295 
309 int BinaryStream::getChunkCount()
310 {
311  return (getCapacity() / m_chunkSize);
312 }
313 
329 std::size_t BinaryStream::getCapacity() const
330 {
331  return m_buffer.size();
332 }

411 
419 void IBinaryStream::read(char *data, std::size_t size)
420 {
421  if ((m_pos + size) > getSize()) {
422  throw std::runtime_error("Bad memory access!");
423  }
424 
425  std::memcpy(data, m_buffer.data() + m_pos, size);
426  m_pos += size;
427 }
428 
441 OBinaryStream::OBinaryStream()
442  : BinaryStream(), m_expandable(true)
443 {
444 }
445 
455 OBinaryStream::OBinaryStream(std::size_t size)
456  : BinaryStream(size), m_expandable(size == 0)
457 {
458 }
459 
469 void OBinaryStream::open(std::size_t size)
470 {
471  // Set the stream expandable to allow changing its size
472  m_expandable = true;
473 
474  // Open a stream with the desidered size
475  BinaryStream::open(size);
476 
477  // Set the definitive expandable flag
478  m_expandable = (size == 0);
479 }
480 
488 void OBinaryStream::setSize(std::size_t size)
489 {
490  if (!m_expandable) {
491  throw std::runtime_error("Stream is not expandable.");
492  }
493 
494  BinaryStream::setSize(size);
495 }
496 
501 void OBinaryStream::squeeze()
502 {
503  bool expandableFlag = m_expandable;
504 
505  // Set the stream expandable to allow changing its size
506  m_expandable = true;
507 
508  // Update the size of the stream
509  setSize(tellg());
510 
511  // Set the expandable flag back to its initial value
512  m_expandable = expandableFlag;
513 }
514 
522 void OBinaryStream::write(const char *data, std::size_t size)
523 {
524  if (getSize() - m_pos < size) {
525  // If the stream is not expandable, the request for a new size
526  // will throw an exception.
527  std::size_t bufferSize = getSize() + size;
528  setSize(bufferSize);
529  }
530 
531  std::memcpy(m_buffer.data() + m_pos, data, size);
532  m_pos += size;
533 }
534 
535 }
